experiences.title: Joined KL University
experiences.description: In 2021 September I have joined KL University and started my computer science and engineering career! I have started learning Java and C programming. Participated in various coding platforms.

experiences.title: Introduced to web development
experiences.description: I have gained interest in web development when I have participated in a social internship by Swecha AP.

experiences.title: Started Django
experiences.description: Thanks to Ashesh sir, because of whom I have explored many new techniques and gained foundation in Python, HTML, CSS, JS, Flask and Django. Participated in hackathon for first time.

experiences.title: Gained interest in Cyber security
experiences.description: At this time I have introduced to cyber security concepts, Kali Linux etc.

experiences.title: Started MERN stack
experiences.description: Thanks to Mohammed Gouse sir, because of whom I have gained interest in MERN stack, learnt JS and developed a Ecommerce website during participation in Hackathon in this semester.

experiences.title: Started Enterprise programming, JFSD
experiences.description: Under guidance of Ashesh sir, I have earned a Redhat certification for Enterprise application Developers, A global certification. Started working on Banking application using Spring boot and react.

experiences.title: Cracked interview at Barclays for a summer Internship
experiences.description: I have attended my first ever interview. Till this date I have made many projects and was good in DBMS, DSA and web development etc.

experiences.title: Restarted DSA in Java - revision
experiences.description: Started revising the concepts of DSA using Java with the help of CRT and Striver.

experiences.title: Joined Barclays as an intern
experiences.description: First time introduced to a corporate world especially banking sector.

experiences.title: JPMC Hackathon winner
experiences.description: Won the JPMC Code for good hackathon conducted at Hyderabad. It was an amazing experience.

experiences.title: Completed internship at Barclays
experiences.description: Worked on springboot and react js for developing a tool for internal usage at barclays, got appreciations from all tech leads, directors and managers.

experiences.title: Completed the RPA Club's site
experiences.description: Worked on MERN stack for developing a robust application for RPA clubs users and managers with role based access and a clean UI.

testimonial.quote: It was pleasure working with Rajgopal on developing a website for KL University's hackathons. His dedication and innovative solutions greatly contributed to the success of the project. His work was truly commendable!

Team of Rajgopal, Manoj and Rajendra have done a fabulous job and I have seen how they have grown from simple web page to a complete website with many features. Keep up the good work and I am sure you guys will make it big very soon!!!
I want to convey my heartfelt thanks for making Y21 EP Hackathon a grand success. The effort you put into the web application is awesome and brings immense happiness.
The RPA club website was impressive with the functionalities and UI, thanks for your work from Team RPA

Collaborating with Rajgopal in the Autobots team was an incredible experience. His expertise and commitment to excellence played a crucial role in achieving our project goals. We look forward to working together again!

As a team lead for a Smart India Hackathon project, Rajgopal showcased exceptional leadership skills. His ability to organize and guide the team resulted in a successful and impactful project. It was a pleasure working under his leadership!
Rajgopal's contribution to the SDP-01 project in Django was truly commendable, As it was first time we had a new and wonderful experience in developing application
